name: Hearts On The Line
description:
Hearts on the Line

Team: UCM

Description: Lost. But not alone. Control two independent characters or play with a friend in this delightful puzzle platformer. Bonded together by a lifeline, players must work together to escape a snowy crevice and dodge all sorts of dangers! Will you and your ball-and-chain make it out alive?

Controls: WASD to move for the orange player and arrow keys to move for the blue player. 

Orange player activates runes using 'E'

Blue player activates runes using 'right shift'

Buttons for Pause/Play and reset checkpoint in the top left.
